#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HolePlacementWithDistances.

== Name ==

*[CHolePlacementWithDistances HolePlacementWithDistances]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HolePlacementWithDistances (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Description of the placement on the hole on the surface of the green in a precise,
				tournament fashion, which includes length and width of the green and distance of
				the hole from 2 edges of the green.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  number = [SOneToEighteen OneToEighteen.html]>  (green-length, green-width, hole-distance{2,2}  )</...>
}}}
----

|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits green-length] ||  					Length of green.				 ||
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits green-width] ||  					Width of green.				 ||
|| [CHoleDistanceOnGreen golfml:HoleDistanceOnGreen] || [CHoleDistanceOnGreen hole-distance] ||  					Distance of hole from edge of green.				 ||
